QuestData.Title: For Posterity
QuestData.Description: Da land of da ice trolls is a shadow of its former glory.$b$bIf you be havin' the courage, search for history tablets to see what brought the Drakkari Empire to such an end.$B$BPerhaps one day we be givin' dis land back to a new line of frost trolls.
QuestData.LogDescription: Tol'mar in Gundrak wants you to collect 6 Drakkari History Tablets.
QuestData.CompletionText: You find da Drakkari history tablets, mon?
QuestData.RewardText: We trolls been subject to da splittin' of empires for longer than some races been existin'.$B$BWe always regrow from da ruins.
